metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0357 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A heap-overflow flaw exists in the -tr loader of iucode-tool starting withv1.4 and before v2.1.1, potentially leading to SIGSEGV, or heap corruption.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0357` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

iucode-tool - 1.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: iucode-tool package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.1-1ubuntu0.1').
